title: Colorado National Monument: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia        Monument Canyon. Walk up to a monolith on the Monument Canyon Trail. Sally Bellacqua        Coke Ovens. Discover the Coke Ovens Trail 3.8 miles (6.1 km) east of the visitor center. Sally Bellacqua        Watch for bighorn sheep on steep slopes and the collared lizard on the canyon floor.
